author: veithen
msg: Added some maven-(install|deploy|assembly)-plugin magic so that during the release process, it automatically builds the directory structure that needs to be uploaded to /www/www.apache.org/dist/axis/axis2/java/core/ on minotaur.

author: markt
msg: Restore the ability (via an option) to edit the contents of WEB-INF and META-INF via WebDAV

author: krosenvold
msg: [SUREFIRE-482] Surefire now only runs correct junit tests
Run with -Dsurefire.junit4.upgradecheck=true at least once when upgrading
